headline: Ask HN: What problem do you wish someone would solve?
description:
Is there a task or activity that regularly causes you grief during your day-to-day (no matter how big or small)?

Post it here to potentially motivate someone to work on a solution!

Last threads:

- https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=30232853 - https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=29796099
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 你希望有人能解决什么问题？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 你希望有人能解決什麼問題？
description_zh-Hans:
在你的日常工作中，是否有一项任务或活动经常给你带来烦恼（无论大小）？

把它贴在这里，可能会激励别人去努力解决！
